Paul's Journal

fly sjc

Flying out of San Jose is fun. There is always someone working for a cool tech company on every flight. So, last night I see a dude in a MySQL shirt, and I walk over:

Me: Hey, do you happen to work for MySQL?

MySQL Dude: Yep.

Me: Awesome, If you don’t mind, I have some questions about MySQL Cluster…

PS: I am in spokompton for Friday and Saturday, then I am going to Seattle on Sunday, to watch the Mariners play lose to the Red Sox. Who could of guessed the M’s would take such a dive after the All-Star game. Now they are only 14 games back. hahahahaha
